# üõ°Ô∏è Sub-Issue: Advanced Moderation Tools

## Goal
Build advanced moderation tools including auto-moderation, flagging queue, moderation logs, and community rules editor for scalable and efficient moderation.

## Tasks
- [ ] Extend Prisma schema for moderation logs, rules, and content flags
- [ ] Implement backend logic for auto-moderation, flagging, and moderation actions
- [ ] Create frontend moderation dashboard UI (queue, logs, rules)
- [ ] Add bulk actions and audit trail features
- [ ] Integrate spam detection and rate limiting
- [ ] Write tests for moderation workflows and authorization

## Acceptance Criteria
- Moderation tools cover all features in [parent issue](./community-engagement-core.md)
- Moderators can efficiently manage flagged content and rules
- Audit trail and logs are accurate and secure
